title: Max containers count
desc: The max number of encrypted containers to store in-app.

title: Container recording duration
desc: How many seconds of recording each container must store.

title: Container member duration
desc: How many seconds of recording each file inside a container must store.

title: Polling interval
desc: Min interval in seconds between value retrievals (gps, sensors...).

title: Persistent service
desc: Keep recording in background when app is closed.

title: Language
desc: Display language of the application (not functional yet).
